00025 #if !defined(TIMER_HPP)
00026 #define TIMER_HPP
00027 
00028 #include <iostream>
00029 #include <string>
00030 #include <stdexcept>
00031 
00032 #include <sys/time.h>
00033 #include <sys/resource.h>
00034 #include <boost/format.hpp>

00036 #include <loos_defs.hpp>

00039 namespace loos {
00040 
00042   class WallTimer {
00043   public:
00044     double currentTime(void) const {
00045       struct timeval tv;
00046       
00047       int i = gettimeofday(&tv, 0);
00048       if (i < 0)
00049         throw(std::runtime_error("Error in gettimeofday()"));
00050       return(static_cast<double>(tv.tv_sec) + static_cast<double>(tv.tv_usec) * 1e-6);
00051     }
00052   };
00053   
00055   class UserTimer {
00056   public:
00057     double currentTime(void) const {
00058       struct rusage ru;
00059       int i = getrusage(RUSAGE_SELF, &ru);
00060       if (i < 0)
00061         throw(std::runtime_error("Error in getrusage()"));
00062       return(static_cast<double>(ru.ru_utime.tv_sec) + static_cast<double>(ru.ru_utime.tv_usec) * 1e-6);
00063     }
00064   };
00065 
00066 
00068 
00079   template<class TimerType = WallTimer>
00080   class Timer : public TimerType {
00081   public:
00082     Timer() : t0(0), t1(0), avg(0), lapt(0), n(0), running(false) { }
00083 
00085     void start(void) {
00086       lapt = t0 = TimerType::currentTime();
00087       n=0;
00088       avg = 0.0;
00089       running = true;
00090     }
00091 
00093     // Automatically adds a lap...
00094     double stop(void) {
00095       t1 = TimerType::currentTime();
00096       avg += (t1 - lapt);
00097       ++n;
00098       running = false;
00099       return(t1-t0);
00100     }
00101 
00103 
00109     double elapsed(void) const { return( running ? TimerType::currentTime() - t0 : t1 - t0 ); }
00110 
00112 
00118     double lap(void) {
00119       if (!running)    // Don't adjust lap time if the timer ain't running...
00120         return(0.0);
00121 
00122       double t = TimerType::currentTime();
00123       double lt = t - lapt;
00124       lapt = t;
00125       avg += lt;
00126       ++n;
00127     }
00128 
00130     double averageLapTime(void) { return(avg / n); }
00131     
00132   private:
00133     double t0, t1, avg, lapt;
00134     ulong n;
00135     bool running;
00136   };
00137 
00138   template<class T>
00139   std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Timer<T>& t) {
00140     std::string s = timeAsString(t.elapsed());
00141     os << "Elapsed time " << s;
00142     return(os);
00143   }
00144 }
